name: itk-elastix-build
description: npm scripts to generate itk-wasm artifacts.

scripts.build: npm run build:emscripten && npm run build:wasi && npm run bindgen:typescript
scripts.bindgen:typescript: itk-wasm -b emscripten-build bindgen --output-dir wasm/typescript --package-name @itk-wasm/elastix --package-description "A toolbox for rigid and nonrigid registration of images." --repository 'https://github.com/InsightSoftwareConsortium/ITKElastix'
